name: Backyard Basketball [NDS]
description:
Shoot and score big time with Backyard Basketball, a full court
basketball simulation with fast-paced, crazy arcade action. Play
alongside NBA superstars as kids—Paul Pierce, Shaquille O’Neal, Allen
Iverson, Tracy McGrady, Yao Ming, and more. Backyard Basketball features
spectacular new graphics, interactive backgrounds, and realistic
gameplay with season mode, stats, minigames, unlockables, and tons of
surprises. The best selling kid’s basketball videogame of all time,
Backyard Basketball is the only official youth basketball game endorsed
by the NBA.
